thread.title: Rosario Dawson To Voice 'Batgirl' In Warner Bros.' 'Lego Batman'
thread.title_full: Rosario Dawson To Voice 'Batgirl' In Warner Bros.' 'Lego Batman'

title: Rosario Dawson To Voice 'Batgirl' In Warner Bros.' 'Lego Batman'
text: Rosario Dawson To Voice 'Batgirl' In Warner Bros.' 'Lego Batman' Reported by Outsiders - 2015.10.16 Rosario Dawson has signed on to voice the character of Barbara Gordon, the daughter of police commissioner James Gordon who later becomes the crime-fighting heroine Batgirl in the upcoming Warner Bros.' The Lego Movie spinoff, Lego Batman. Will Arnett is reprising the Caped Crusader role he originated in The Lego Movie with Michael Cera voicing the heroÂ’s sidekick, Robin, while Zach Galifianakis is in negotiations to play the Joker. Chris McKay is directing the project from a script written by author-screenwriter Seth Grahame-Smith. Dan Lin, Roy Lee, Phil Lord and Christopher Miller are producing.
